text: Freestyle skiing at the 2018 Winter Olympics was held at the Bokwang Phoenix Park in Pyeongchang, South Korea. The events were scheduled to take place between 9 and 23 February 2018. A total of ten freestyle skiing events were held. ==Qualification== A maximum of 282 quota spots were available to athletes at the games. A maximum of 30 athletes could be entered by a National Olympic Committee, with a maximum of 16 men or 16 women. Each event had a specific quota amount allocated to it. ==Competition schedule== The following was the competition schedule for all ten events. Sessions that included the event finals are shown in bold. All times are (UTC+9). {| class=wikitable |- ! Date !! Time !!
